member.name: T:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverter
member.summary: Supports conversion from any type of document to another using SVG, OCR and Raster technologies.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of DocumentConverter.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverter.SetAnnRenderingEngineInstance(Leadtools.Annotations.Core.AnnRenderingEngine)
member.summary: Sets the rendering engine to use when overlaying annotations during document conversion.
member.param: The rendering engine to use when overlaying annotations during document conversion.

member.summary: Sets the document writer instance to use when converting documents.
member.param: The document writer instance to use when converting documents.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverter.SetOcrEngineInstance(Leadtools.Forms.Ocr.IOcrEngine,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the engine instance to use when converting documents using OCR.
member.param: The OCR engine instance to use when converting documents. If this is not **null**, then the engine must be initialized and started.
and not dispose instance when this DocumentConverter is disposed.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJob
member.summary: Document converter job.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJob.ConversionModes
member.summary: Conversion modes used for this job.
member.value: One or more DocumentConverterConversionModes enumeration members that specify the type(s) of conversions used in this job.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJob.DocumentConverter
member.summary: Instance of the DocumentConverter used to create and run this object.
member.value: The instance of the DocumentConverter used to create and run this object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJob.Errors
member.summary: Any errors occurred when this job is run.
member.value: A list of DocumentConverterJobError objects that contain detailed information on any errors that may have occurred when this job is run.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJob.JobData
member.summary: Job data.
member.value: A copy of the DocumentConverterJobData structure that was used to create this job.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJob.OutputAnnotationFiles
member.summary: Output annotation files generated by this conversion job.
member.value: A list that contains the full paths of all output annotation files generated by this conversion job (if any).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJob.OutputDocumentExtraFiles
member.summary: Output document extra files generated by this conversion job.
member.value: A list that contains the full paths of all output document extra files generated by this conversion job.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJob.OutputDocumentFiles
member.summary: Output document files generated by this conversion job.
member.value: A list that contains the full paths of all output document files generated by this conversion job.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJob.OutputFiles
member.summary: Output files generated by this conversion job.
member.value: A list that contains the full paths of all output files generated by this conversion job.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJob.Status
member.summary: Final job status.
member.value: The final job status.

member.summary: Data for the JobStarted, JobOperation andJobCompleted events.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of DocumentConverterJobEventArgs.

member.summary: The AnnContainer object used when annotations are loaded or saved.
member.value: The AnnContainer object used when annotations are loaded or saved.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobEventArgs.AnnotationsMode
member.summary: Current annotations mode.
member.value: The current annotations mode.

member.summary: The current input Document object.
member.value: The current input Document object.

member.summary: The DocumentWriter object used when saving document formats.
member.value: The DocumentWriter object used when saving document formats.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobEventArgs.InputDocumentPageNumber
member.summary: The current input page number.
member.value: The 1-based current input page number.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobEventArgs.IsPostOperation
member.summary: A value that indicates whether the engine has already run the operation.
member.value: **true** if the engine has already run the operation; otherwise, **false** and the engine is about to run the operation.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobEventArgs.Job
member.summary: The current job object.
member.value: The current job object that was passed to RunJob or RunJobAsync.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobEventArgs.OcrDocument
member.summary: The IOcrDocument object created when converting using OCR.
member.value: The IOcrDocument object created by the engine when OCR is used in the conversion.

member.summary: The IOcrPage object created when converting using OCR.
member.value: The IOcrPage object created by the engine when OCR is used in the conversion.

member.summary: RasterImage object used as the input for a page when OCR conversion is used.
member.value: The IOcrPage object used as the input for a page when OCR conversion is used.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobEventArgs.Operation
member.summary: The current operation.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobEventArgs.OutputDocumentPageNumber
member.summary: The current output page number.
member.value: The 1-based current output page number.

member.summary: The RasterImage object used as the input for raster conversion and optional overlay for SVG conversion.
member.value: The RasterImage object used as the input for raster conversion and optional overlay for SVG conversion.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobEventArgs.Status
member.summary: Current status of the job and allows the user to cancel it.
member.value: The current status of the job and allows the user to cancel it.

member.summary: The SvgDocument object used when SVG conversion is used.

Path to the output file to be generated by this conversion.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterOptions
member.summary: Manages the extra options to use with the document converter.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterOptions.EmptyPageMode
member.summary: Determines how empty pages are treated during the conversion.
member.value: Determines how empty pages are treated during the conversion. Default value is DocumentConverterEmptyPageMode.None.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterOptions.EnableSvgConversion
member.summary: Indicates whether SVG conversion should be used, if available.
member.value: **true** if SVG conversion should be used, if available; otherwise, **false** and OCR mode is forced.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterOptions.JobErrorMode
member.summary: Indicates whether to abort or try to continue running jobs when an error occurs.
member.value: An DocumentConverterJobErrorMode enumeration member that specifies whether to abort or try to continue running jobs when an error occur. Default

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterOptions.OutputSinglePages
member.summary: Saves each page in a separate file regardless of the final document format.
member.value: **true** to save each page in a separate file regardless of the final document format; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterOptions.PageNumberingTemplate
member.summary: Template to use for the individual file names when the output format does not support multi-pages.
member.value: A string that contains the template to use for the individual file names when the output format does not support multi-pages.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterOptions.SvgImagesRecognitionMode
member.summary: Indicates how to treat the image elements encountered in the input SVG page during the conversion.
member.value: A value that indicate how to treat the image elements encountered in the input SVG page during the conversion. Default value is

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterOptions.UseThreads
member.summary: Indicates whether to use multiple threads during the conversion.
member.value: **true** to use multiple threads during the conversion; otherwise, **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterPreprocessor
member.summary: Manages the pre-processing options of the document converter.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterPreprocessor.BlankPageDetectorCommandFlags
member.summary: Options to use for detecting empty raster pages.
member.value: The options to use for detecting empty raster pages. Default value is BlankPageDetectorCommandFlags.None

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterPreprocessor.Deskew
member.summary: Indicates that automatic deskewing should be used.
member.value: **true** if automatic deskewing should be used; otherwise, **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterPreprocessor.Invert
member.summary: Indicates that automatic inversion correction should be used.
member.value: **true** if automatic inversion correction should be used; otherwise, **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterPreprocessor.Orient
member.summary: Indicates that automatic orientation correction should be used.
member.value: **true** if automatic orientation correction should be used; otherwise, **false**. Default value is **false**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode
member.summary: Annotation conversion options.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode.None
member.summary: Do not save any annotations.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode.External
member.summary: Export the annotations to an external file.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode.Overlay
member.summary: Overlay the annotations over the image (raster conversion only).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode.Embed
member.summary: Embed the annotations in the final document (for PDF and TIFF file formats only).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterConversionModes
member.summary: Types of conversions that were used during the operation of this job.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterConversionModes.None
member.summary: None. The job did not start yet or an error occurred prior to any specific conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterConversionModes.SVG
member.summary: SVG conversion was used.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterConversionModes.OCR
member.summary: OCR conversion was used.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterConversionModes.Raster
member.summary: Raster conversion was used.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterEmptyPageMode
member.summary: Controls how empty pages are treated during the conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterEmptyPageMode.None
member.summary: Empty page will be added to the document and no checking is performed.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterEmptyPageMode.Skip
member.summary: Skip empty pages. The page is considered not empty if the annotations container for page contains items.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterEmptyPageMode.SkipIgnoreAnnotations
member.summary: Skip empty pages. The page is considered empty even if the annotations container for page contains items.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobErrorMode
member.summary: Controls how the engine handles errors that may occur during conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobErrorMode.Abort
member.summary: Abort the conversion job.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobErrorMode.Continue
member.summary: Continue on non-critical errors.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation
member.summary: Document converter operation.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.Started
member.summary: The conversion has started. Only with the DocumentConverterJobs.JobStarted event.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.Completed
member.summary: The conversion has completed. Only with the DocumentConverterJobs.JobCompleted event.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.CreateDocument
member.summary: A new Document object is created from InputDocumentFileName.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.BeginDocumentWriter
member.summary: DocumentWriter.BeginDocument is called to create the output document. Document conversion only.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.EndDocumentWriter
member.summary: DocumentWriter.EndDocument is called to finalize the output document. Document conversion only.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.Other
member.summary: General operation.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.LoadRasterPage
member.summary: DocumentPage.GetImage is called get the raster image of a page. Document and Raster conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.SaveRasterPage
member.summary: is called to save the page image. Raster conversion only.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.LoadSvgPage
member.summary: DocumentPage.GetSvg is called get the SVG image of a page. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.AddDocumentPage
member.summary: DocumentWriter.AddPage is called to add a page to the document. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.PreprocessPage
member.summary: AutoPreprocess is called to pre-process the page.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.CreateOcrDocument
member.summary: object. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.AddOcrPage
member.summary: AddPage(RasterImage,OcrProgressCallback) object. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.AutoZoneOcrPage
member.summary: IOcrPage.AutoZone is called. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.RecognizeOcrPage
member.summary: IOcrPage.Recognize is called. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.SaveOcrPage
member.summary: IOcrDocument.Save with a single page is called. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.SaveOcrDocument
member.summary: IOcrDocument.Save is called. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.ConvertOcrDocument
member.summary: DocumentWriter.Convert is during OCR conversion called. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.LoadAnnotations
member.summary: AnnCodecs.Load is called to load the annotations from the input document or external input annotations file.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.SaveAnnotations
member.summary: AnnCodecs.Save is called to save the annotations to the external output annotations file.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.EmbedAnnotations
member.summary: The annotations are being embedded into the output document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.ConvertDocument
member.summary: DocumentWriter.Convert is called during SVG conversion. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobOperation.OverlayAnnotations
member.summary: The annotations is being overlayed on top of the page.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobStatus
member.summary: Job status.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobStatus.Success
member.summary: The job is successful.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobStatus.SuccessWithErrors
member.summary: The job is partially successful.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobStatus.Aborted
member.summary: The job was not successful and is aborted.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterSvgImagesRecognitionMode
member.summary: Determines how image elements inside SVG documents are treated during SVG conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterSvgImagesRecognitionMode.Disabled
member.summary: Do not use OCR recognition for the image elements. Instead, the image element is added as is to the final document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterSvgImagesRecognitionMode.Always
member.summary: Use OCR recognition on the image elements. The recognition data is added to the final document with the rest of the other SVG elements of the page.

member.summary: Data for a document converter job.

member.summary: Controls how annotations are saved in the output document.
member.value: A DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode enumeration value that controls how annotations are saved in the output document. Default value is

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobData.Document
member.summary: Document object to be used as the input of the conversion. Either this or InputDocumentFileName are used.
member.value: The Document object to be used as the input of the conversion. If this value is not **null**,

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobData.DocumentFormat
member.summary: Output format to use for document conversion.
member.value: The output format to use for document conversion.

member.summary: Path to the file containing the annotations file to be added to the output document. Optional.
member.value: The path to the file containing the annotations file to be added to the output document. This is an optional value and will be used

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobData.InputDocumentFileName
member.summary: Path to the input file for the conversion. Either this or Document are used.
member.value: The path to the input file for the conversion. If this value is not **null**, then it will be used as the input document for

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobData.InputDocumentFirstPageNumber
member.summary: Number of the first page to be converted from the input document
member.value: The 1-based number of the first page to be converted from the input document. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobData.InputDocumentLastPageNumber
member.summary: Number of the last page to be converted from the input document
member.value: The 1-based number of the last page to be converted from the input document. A value of -1 means to use the last page in the document. Default value is 0.

member.summary: Optional job name.

member.summary: Name of the file that will contain the annotations parsed from the input document. Optional
member.value: The name to the file that will contain the annotations parsed from the input document. Optional

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobData.OutputDocumentFileName
member.summary: Name of the output file to be generated by this conversion.
member.value: Name of the output file to be generated by this conversion.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobData.RasterImageBitsPerPixel
member.summary: Bits per pixel to use for the output document when raster conversion is used.
member.value: The bits per pixel to use for the output document when raster conversion is used. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobData.RasterImageFormat
member.summary: Output format to use for raster conversion.
member.value: The output format to use for raster conversion.

member.summary: Optional user-defined object that can be used a long side the job events to pass application specified data.
member.value: The optional user-defined object that can be used a long side the job events to pass application specified data.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobError
member.summary: Contains information on an document converter job error

member.summary: The exception that was thrown (if any).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Documents.Converters.DocumentConverterJobError.Operation
member.summary: The operation that was running when the error occured.
